I wonder how people can tolerate the clunkiness of this game lmao

• Game feels clunky. Controls are basic; however, movements do snap a lot. For a game made in year 2016, there is no excuse for this game to feel so clunky.

• Me and my friend(s) kept having trouble updating the game. It's better to re-download the entire game than to update the files. Is this an oversight of the development team? Why does the game take 6 hours to install a 100Mb update?

• Cash grab. Just look at all those DLCs. They kept monetizing the game without implementing QoL improvements.

Ist ein Hurensohn Game, jeder der das länger als 20 Minuten spielen kann, sollte von seinen Eltern geschlagen und in der Wildnis ausgesetzt werden. Die Community besteht -wie bereits erwähnt- aus absoluten Hurensöhnen, wenn man diese ungeschriebenen "Regeln" nicht einhält, kommen die Spieler direkt auf dein Profil und beleidigen dich in den Kommentaren.  Z.B. wenn man einen Überlebenden am Haken abcampt, weil der 10min vor einem weg gerannt ist und dabei 20 Paletten umgeworfen hat, um dann zu Teabaggen. Ich finde das Spielprinzip sehr cool gemacht, auch die Storys und Crossover-Killer, allerdings ist dieses Drecksgame, wie auch viele anderen Spiele durch Schwitzer, Tryhards und die Toxische Community unspielbar. Übrigens habe ich es bei noch keinem anderen Spiel erlebt, dass man nach der Runde von dem Gegner angeschrieben wird, nicht mal die Cod- Community macht sowas.

At itself its a wonderful game with fun mechanics and awesome characters, yet the community doesnt let you learn the game, as well as that the Matchmaking only throws you against far more experienced and higher leveled players. I'm sorry butI really can't recommend this game if it's so simply unfair against new players.

This game is a lot of fun, it gets a little repetitive because the roles are so set but really it's a heck a lot of fun once you find a killer or survivor you really like to play. The skills and combos you can do are just great fun. So I'd say find that one killer that calls to you or survivor and get extra good at them. Also great when you find a good combo of skills to bring into a mission. I have found that the Wraith is EXTRA fun to play when you use the ghost and the coxcomb clapper addons together. No sound stealth and no fear aura when coming out of stealth to really get a good jump scare on people.

Yaklaşık 200 saat oynadım. Gerçekleri söylemek gerekirse bunun 20 saati tahminen sıra beklemek ile geçti. Eğer arkadaşlarınız ile oynayacaksanız eğlenceli bir oyun.

+Artıları:
Rekabetçi ve eğlenceli
Farklı Buildler deneyerek kendinizi geliştirebilirsiniz
Arkadaşlar ile birlikte girince aşırı eğlenceli
Katil ve Survivor arasındaki oyun deneyimi bence çok farklı ve bu oyun deneyimini çeşitlendiriyor.

-Eksileri:
Hitbox'lar biraz tuhaf işliyor
Bazen sıra beklemek gerçekten bayıyor
Tünellenmek ve Facecamplenmek
Good but they do not punish hook campers.
je vous le recommande fortement il est genial a jouer avec des amis surtout quand on est le tueur

Vorweg, ich spiele ausschließlich private Runden mit Freunden, über offene Runden und andere Spieler kann ich nichts sagen. 

Mit der richtigen Gruppe macht kann das Spiel verdammt viel Spaß machen. Ich selbst habe in "PVP"-Spielen sonst immer eine recht niedrige Frustrationsgrenze, daher hat es mich wirklich überrascht wie viel Spaß es machen kann mit ein paar Nettigkeitregeln. Als Surviver hat man in einer vollen Vierergruppe wirklich eine Chance gegen den Killer anzukommen,  gleichzeitig hat der Killer mit genügend Können die Möglichkeit der Gruppe das Leben zur Hölle zu machen. 

Die Mechaniken sind einfach zu verstehen und mithilfe verschiedener Perks kann man sich vielfältig ausprobieren. Mir hat das Spiel eine Menge Freude bereitet und ich probiere immer mal wieder gerne neue Killer oder Survivor aus :)

It's a fun experience from either side and a nice break from the traditional horror style games. One thing I wish they would change, though, it the ability to escape once downed by the killer. It feels incredibly scuffed to do it to someone as a last "fuck you," but it is also incredibly infuriating when you get a lucky down at the end of a match and they can still get out.

想玩人的呢，可以入这个游戏，想玩屠夫的话就算了，现在屠夫真就任何体验了，杀机我玩一段时间就弃坑一段时间，每次回来人类越来越强，修机速度越来越快,车队越来越多，我刚回来低分段屠夫匹的人类段位越来越高，（来自一个只玩屠夫的玩家）
简直好玩的一批我感觉我玩3000+小时的吃鸡还不如玩杀鸡我最爱玩的游戏了！

Guarda io ti dico giocaci però mannaggia che fastidio delle volte eh, state tutti inviperiti su sto gioco che pare league of legends o come si chiama.
Per il resto l'idea ci sta, a me piace quando mi si fa il tunneling perchè così mi sembra che qualcuno mi vuole nella vita, vabhe dai magari va meglio la prossima non si può avere tutto.
Comunque magari mi sbaglio però quelli lì che ti corrono dietro li ho già visti da qualche parte, sarà che ho visto troppa televisione da bambino bho, mi sembra strano fatemi sapere.
Alla fine ho smesso di giocarci perchè ho scaricato resident evil cioè non c'è paragone però bel giochino anche questo, se hai degli amici ti diverti di più, mica come me dai, mi raccomando esci la sera ogni tanto, ho sentito che se stai troppo al pc poi diventi bianco e cattivo come quello là di halloween non so come si chiama.

This game has a very good concept and for the most part executes it really well. The downside is that some killers promote camping (Twins) and some are really annoying to go against solo queuing. Don't camp, help your teammates and you should have a good time.
el mejor juego que eh visto de supervivencia
